'''Abyssal Traces''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during the [[World Quest]] [[Bough Keeper: Dainsleif]]. It takes place in the [[Temple of the Falcon]].

==Steps==
# Activate the mechanism to unlock the door
# Enter the next room
#* Defeat opponent
#* {{Enemy|Hilichurl|x=1}}
#* There is an Exquisite Chest behind a rock pile the hilichurl was at.
# Activate the Door of Resurrection
# Defeat opponents
#* {{Enemy List|Blazing Axe Mitachurl;Cryo Hilichurl Shooter;Electro Hilichurl Shooter;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter;Hilichurl Grenadier*2|#*}}
#* This room contains a Common Chest and an Exquisite Chest.
# Interact with the device to unlock the door
# Defeat opponents
#* {{Enemy List|Pyro Abyss Mage;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter;Hilichurl Fighter*4|#*}}
#* This room contains a [[Common Chest]]
# Use the wind current to glide up to the last room
# Defeat opponents
#* {{Enemy List|Hydro Abyss Mage;Pyro Abyss Mage|#*}}
#* A cutscene will start after defeating the Abyss Mages
#* A [[Precious Chest]] appears after the cutscene.

==Completion Rewards==
{{Card|Mora|10,000}}
{{Card|Adventurer's Experience|2}}
{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|2}}
